raf_autenticated.rafemailsubject: Enroll with Grand Rapids Energy and we could both get $25!
raf_autenticated.rafterms: * Subject to the Refer-a-Friend program (“RAF Program”) rules and terms and conditions available here.  Existing GRE customers who refer one or more new customers to GRE using the RAF Program (each, a “Referrer”) may earn a $25 Visa® Reward Card for each new customer who: (i) enrolls on an eligible GRE price plan, (ii) provides Referrer’s Referral Code at enrollment, and (iii) begins burning gas on an eligible GRE price plan. Referrers must: have either an active or pending account with GRE when Referee begins burning gas; authenticate their GRE account; accept the RAF Program terms and conditions; and participate by using the communication methods provided (email, Facebook, and Twitter) at grandrapidsenergy.com/refer and as specified in the RAF Program terms and conditions. Allow 4-6 weeks for delivery. Maximum award: $500 in Visa Reward Cards per person / calendar year for all GRE Visa Reward Card promotional offers. Offer valid for qualifying enrollments processed by GRE between 12/1/2017 and 6/30/2018. Referrers may combine this offer with their pre-existing discounts and promotions. The Visa Reward Card is issued by and is the property of CenterState Bank of Florida, NA pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and is subject to the issuer’s terms and conditions. Reward Cards will not have cash access and can be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted. All trademarks noted herein are held by their respective owners.
